original_title: Adult World: Masked For Her Pleasure
overview: Kyle Michael Porter returns as Uncle Anus, a small-town sex shop employee and big-time self-fisting enthusiast. An all-male colorful cavalcade of whacky customers, angry protestors, and Lutheran pastors join in this extreme hand-balling adventure.
tagline: Kyle Michael Porter / Uncle Anus' Anal Abyss
